CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 29, 1963, pg. 19, reads: "1963 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama Exhibitors who were not shown on last week's picture page are shown here...6. H. J. Heinz Co., F. B. Heard, representative, center, and Miss Ann Mitchell, assistant, right, talking to Home-A Rama visitors... All Home-A-Rama Photos (Including last week's) by Charles (Teenie) Harris."
TitMainTitle: F. B. Heard and Ann Mitchell standing in Heinz booth, with another woman and man standing in front of it, at 1963 Pittsburgh Courier - WAMO Home-A-Rama fair, Syria Mosque
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Syria Mosque (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
